Text: On Reveal: Lower the power of each card in your opponent's hand by 1
On Reveal: Give cards in your hand +1 power
On Reveal: +2 power for each enemy card here
On Reveal: Set ALL cards here to 3 power
On Reveal: Lower the power of each enemy card here by 1
On Reveal: Add a copy with +1 power to your hand.
On Reveal: Discards your other cards here; add their power to this card.
On Reveal: Discard your other cards here; add 2 power for each discarded
End of Turn: -1 power if not winning this location
End of Turn: +1 power; discarded when its power is greater than 7
End of Turn: Loses 1 power if your side of this location is full.
Add two copies to your hand when this card is discarded
When ANY other card is played here; lower that card's power by 1
Gain +1 power when you play another card here
